column5: Located close to Alliance town Center and I35 W, they are both about 5 mins from the house. Also about 15-20 minutes from Downtown Fort Worth and 30 mins from DFW airport. Private room with full size bunk bed and a twin size on the top as pictured. Closet in the room. Bathroom across the hall from the space. Access to washer/dryer, kitchen, living room and backyard. Microwave, stovetop and dishwasher in kitchen open for use.
column8: Nice private room in Fort Worth
